arts.ttl: ‘A great talent’ - Flick hails ‘fearless’ Barca teen Toni Fernandez
arts.sum: Barcelona manager Hansi Flick was full of praise for youngster Toni Fernandez after handing the teenager his first-team debut on Saturday in the Copa del Rey . “He is a great talent and he is also fearless,” he told reporteres.

arts.ttl: Barca raise spirits with a strong performance to start the year
arts.sum: Frenkie de Jong, Eric Garcia, and Pablo Torre all had very strong games, and will surely be looking to break through to start the year, putting pressure on the likes of Marc Casado and Fermin Lopez. Barcelona were focused in the face of major off the field distractions, and got the performance they needed against Barbastro, to open up their Copa del Rey campaign .

arts.ttl: Ronald Araújo hails ‘incredible’ young Barcelona teammate after win over Barbastro
arts.sum: Barcelona star Ronald Araújo has this evening moved to reveal his appreciation for the talents of young teammate Toni Fernandéz. This comes after the starlet enjoyed an outing to remember…

arts.ttl: Barcelona youngster sends message to Hansi Flick vs Barbastro
arts.sum: Barcelona star Pablo Torre made use of his latest outing on Saturday to send something of a message to head coach Hansi Flick. The message in question? I’m here, and…

arts.ttl: Barcelona talent joins Lamine Yamal in history books in win over Barbastro
arts.sum: Barcelona starlet Toni Fernández this evening etched his name firmly into the history books of the Catalans. This comes after the attacker was afforded his first-ever appearance at senior level.…

arts.ttl: Barbastro 0-4 Barcelona: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Robert Lewandowski hits a brace
arts.sum: Barcelona ease their way into the last-16 stage of the Copa del Rey courtesy of a 4-0 success over fourth-tier outfit Barbastro.

arts.ttl: Pablo Torre leads the way as Barcelona cruise past Barbastro 4-0 in the Copa del Rey
arts.sum: The full-time whistle has just blown in the Copa del Rey clash between fourth tier Barbastro and Barcelona, where Hansi Flick’s side have come out as 4-0 winners. The match…

arts.ttl: Watch: Barcelona starlet lays on two brilliant assists during Barbastro clash
arts.sum: Barcelona youngster Pablo Torre was responsible for not one, but two superb assists during the club’s latest outing. Barca are of course currently locked in action, in a Copa del…

arts.ttl: Barcelona star sends message of support to teammates during Barbastro clash
arts.sum: Barcelona star Pau Víctor has this evening taken to social media, to send a message of support to his teammates. This, of course, comes with Hansi Flick’s troops currently locked…

arts.ttl: Watch: Barbastro fans poke fun at Barcelona over Dani Olmo situation
arts.sum: Supporters of Spanish 4th tier outfit Barbastro this evening made use of the opportunity to have some fun at the expense of Barcelona. This of course comes amid the ongoing…
